TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MessageBox extends System.Object

summary.span: 显示消息框。

span.span: Displays a message box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息框是向用户显示文本消息的预制模式对话框。A message box is a prefabricated modal dialog box that displays a text message to a user. 可以通过调用类的静态方法来显示消息框 。You show a message box by calling the static method of the class. 显示的文本消息是传递给的字符串参数 。The text message that is displayed is the string argument that you pass to . 使用方法的若干重载 还可以提供标题栏标题。Several overloads of the method also enables you to provide a title bar caption. 若要允许用户关闭消息框，请 在标题栏中显示一个具有 **"确定"** 按钮和 " **关闭** " 按钮的消息框。To enable a user to close a message box, displays a message box that has an **OK** button and a **Close** button in the title bar. 你还可以使用消息框向用户提出问题。You can also use a message box to ask a user a question. 用户通过单击多个指定为使用枚举显示的按钮之一来回答 。The user answers by clicking one of several buttons that you specify to display by using the enumeration. 可以将此枚举传递给方法的多个重载 。You can pass this enumeration to several overloads of the method. 枚举的默认值 为 。The default value of the enumeration is . 可以通过检查返回的值来确定用户单击的按钮 。You can determine which button a user clicks by examining the value that returns. 返回值是一个 枚举值，其中每个值等于消息框可以显示的按钮之一。The return value is a value of the enumeration, where each value equates to one of the buttons that a message box can display. 消息框的默认值为， 因为 **"确定"** 是默认消息框按钮。The default value for message box is because **OK** is the default message box button. 但是，方法的某些重载 使你能够提供不同的 默认值。However, some overloads of the method enable you to provide a different default value. 消息框可以传达信息，并可以询问具有不同程度的问题的问题。Message boxes can communicate information and can ask questions that have varying degrees of importance. 消息框使用图标来指示重要性。Message boxes use icons to indicate importance. 例如，图标可以指示消息是信息性消息、警告消息还是重要消息。For example, icons can indicate whether the message is informational, is a warning, or is important. 枚举封装一组可能的消息框图标。The enumeration encapsulates the set of possible message box icons. 默认情况下，消息框不显示图标。By default, a message box does not display an icon. 不过，您可以将 值传递到若干 方法重载之一，以指定消息框包含一个图标。However, you can pass a value to one of several method overloads in order to specify that the message box includes an icon. 消息框有时提供特殊功能，如从右到左阅读。Message boxes sometimes provide special functionality, such as right-to-left reading. 您可以通过使用方法的某些重载接受的一个或多个枚举值来自定义消息框的行为 。You can customize the behavior of a message box by using one or more enumeration values that are accepted by some overloads of the method. 消息框始终具有所有者窗口。Message boxes always have an owner window. 默认情况下，消息框的所有者是在消息框打开时应用程序中当前处于活动状态的窗口。By default, the owner of a message box is the window that is currently active in an application at the time that a message box is opened. 但是，可以 使用多个重载之一来指定另一个所有者 。However, you can specify another owner for the by using one of several overloads. 有关所有者窗口的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about owner windows, see . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [MessageBox 示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160023)。For more information, see [MessageBox Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160023).

summary.span: 显示消息框。

span.span: Displays a message box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法的重载 ，该重载使你能够指定所有者窗口。Use an overload of the method, which enables you to specify an owner window. 否则，消息框由当前处于活动状态的窗口所有。Otherwise, the message box is owned by the window that is currently active.

span.span: A that specifies the text to display.

summary.span: 显示一个消息框，该消息框包含消息并返回结果。

span.span: Displays a message box that has a message and that returns a result.

returns.span: 一个 值，用于指定用户单击了哪个消息框按钮。

span.span: A value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

param.name: owner
param.span: 一个 ，表示消息框的所有者窗口。

span.span: A that represents the owner window of the message box.

param.name: messageBoxText
param.span: 一个 ，用于指定要显示的文本。

span.span: A that specifies the text to display.

param.name: caption
param.span: 一个 ，用于指定要显示的标题栏标题。

span.span: A that specifies the title bar caption to display.

param.name: button
param.span: 一个 值，用于指定要显示哪个按钮或哪些按钮。

span.span: A value that specifies which button or buttons to display.

param.name: icon
param.span: 一个 值，用于指定要显示的图标。

span.span: A value that specifies the icon to display.

param.name: defaultResult
param.span: 一个 值，用于指定消息框的默认结果。

span.span: A value that specifies the default result of the message box.

summary.span: 在指定窗口的前面显示消息框。

span.span: Displays a message box in front of the specified window.

summary.span: 该消息框显示消息、标题栏标题、按钮和图标，并接受默认消息框结果和返回结果。

span.span: The message box displays a message, title bar caption, button, and icon; and accepts a default message box result and returns a result.

returns.span: 一个 值，用于指定用户单击了哪个消息框按钮。

span.span: A value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，消息框显示在当前处于活动状态的窗口之前。By default, the message box appears in front of the window that is currently active.
